respStmt.resp: Record created for the Calendar of the Correspondence of Sir John Herschel (CUP: Cambridge), 1998 by
respStmt.name: Michael J. Crowe ed., David R. Dyck and James J. Kevin assoc. eds
Dr Marvin Bolt and Steven Lucy at the Webster Institute of the Adler Planetarium
Michael Hawkins, Epsilon Project, Cambridge University Library

availability.p: Michael J. Crowe (editor), David R. Dyck and James J. Kevin (associate editors), Calendar of the Correspondence of Sir John Herschel (Cambridge, England: Cambridge Univ. Press, 1998), viii + 828 pp. Converted into web usable data in May 2009 by Dr. Marvin Bolt and Steven Lucy, working at the Webster Institute of the Adler Planetarium.

abstract.p: Shortly coming to England with daughter and Madame Gerlach. Gives family news. Mr. Muller has some observations for the Memoirs. Emile Plantamour has succeeded him at the Observatory. Met G. B. Airy and his wife on their journey to Turin. Has also conversed with J. D. Forbes.
